code: import{moonArray}from'./moonList.js';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Shop=function Shop(props){var addItemToCart=function addItemToCart(item){item=JSON.parse(item.target.value);item.quantity=1;return props.changeCartArray(item);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"shopContainer",children:moonArray.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/shop/".concat(item.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.img,alt:"new"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",item.price," - 1mi\xB2"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"productButton",value:JSON.stringify(item),onClick:addItemToCart,children:"Add to Cart"})]},item.id);})});};export default Shop;
